profile.name: Mike Rodriguez
profile.executiveSummary: Hands-on engineering leader with 12 years building distributed systems at scale. Led teams of 8-15 engineers through complex migrations, system redesigns, and rapid growth phases. Deep expertise in cloud architecture, microservices, DevOps practices, and building high-performance engineering cultures. Track record of delivering production systems serving 10M+ users with 99.99% uptime while maintaining 60% hands-on coding time. Known for systematic problem-solving, technical mentorship, and bridging engineering and business stakeholders.

evidence.description: Architected and implemented microservices platform handling 50K requests/sec across 40+ services
evidence.outcome: Achieved 99.99% uptime while reducing infrastructure costs 35% through efficient service design and caching strategies

evidence.description: Diagnosed performance bottleneck in legacy monolith causing 5-second page loads under moderate traffic
evidence.outcome: Reduced p95 latency to 200ms through database query optimization, N+1 elimination, and strategic caching

evidence.description: Led investigation of data inconsistency affecting 2% of transactions with unclear root cause
evidence.outcome: Root caused race condition in distributed system, implemented fix, recovered $500K in lost revenue

evidence.description: Evaluated build vs buy decision for authentication system considering cost, time, security, and maintenance
evidence.outcome: Chose Auth0 integration saving 6 engineer-months and $400K in opportunity cost while improving security posture

evidence.description: Designed event-driven architecture for real-time data pipeline processing 2M events/day
evidence.outcome: Scaled from 10K to 2M events/day with zero downtime migrations and maintained <1s event processing latency

evidence.description: Made call to delay feature launch 2 weeks due to performance concerns in load testing
evidence.outcome: Avoided production incident affecting all users, shipped with 10x better performance after optimization

evidence.description: Developed internal training program on distributed systems fundamentals and best practices
evidence.outcome: Upskilled 35 engineers across 3 teams, reduced architecture review bottlenecks 60%, improved system design quality

evidence.description: Built and scaled engineering team from 3 to 15 while maintaining velocity and team health
evidence.outcome: Zero regrettable attrition over 2 years, promoted 3 engineers to senior and 2 to staff level

evidence.description: Implemented code review standards, automated testing requirements, and quality gates in CI/CD pipeline
evidence.outcome: Reduced production bugs 75% while improving deployment confidence and accelerating release velocity

evidence.description: Self-taught Kubernetes and cloud-native patterns to lead infrastructure modernization initiative
evidence.outcome: Successfully migrated 40 services to k8s within 6 months, became internal SME mentoring 20+ engineers

evidence.description: Analyzed production system behavior to identify optimization opportunities and resource waste
evidence.outcome: Reduced cloud infrastructure costs $200K annually through rightsizing, auto-scaling, and efficiency improvements

evidence.description: Evaluated competing database technologies for new analytics workload requiring complex queries at scale
evidence.outcome: Selected ClickHouse achieving 50x query performance vs PostgreSQL while staying within budget constraints

evidence.description: Diagnosed intermittent production issues occurring <1% of requests using distributed tracing and log analysis
evidence.outcome: Resolved 15 critical production issues with average MTTR of 45 minutes, preventing customer impact

evidence.description: Built comprehensive observability platform with metrics, logs, traces, and alerting across all services
evidence.outcome: Reduced MTTD from 30 minutes to 3 minutes enabling faster incident response and preventing outages

evidence.description: Selected cloud infrastructure, databases, message queues, and tooling for greenfield platform build
evidence.outcome: Choices enabled team to scale from MVP to production handling 50K RPS within budget and timeline

evidence.description: Set up and configured production Kubernetes clusters across multiple regions with disaster recovery
evidence.outcome: Achieved production-ready k8s platform supporting 50+ teams with 99.95% availability SLA

evidence.description: Quickly parse technical documentation, RFCs, and research papers to evaluate new technologies
evidence.outcome: Made informed technology decisions staying ahead of industry trends and avoiding costly mistakes

evidence.description: Author comprehensive design docs, RFCs, and runbooks for complex system changes and incidents
evidence.outcome: Improved team alignment, reduced implementation surprises, created knowledge base preventing repeat incidents

evidence.description: Conduct 1:1s with team members understanding career goals, concerns, and growth opportunities
evidence.outcome: Built trust leading to high team engagement scores and proactive surfacing of technical debt and issues

evidence.description: Present architecture proposals to technical leadership and non-technical stakeholders effectively
evidence.outcome: Secured buy-in for 5 major technical initiatives including $2M infrastructure modernization project

evidence.description: Coordinate cross-team technical initiatives involving 30+ engineers across 6 teams
evidence.outcome: Delivered complex migrations on schedule with minimal disruption through effective coordination and communication

evidence.description: Balance coding, architecture reviews, mentoring, and management responsibilities across competing priorities
evidence.outcome: Maintained 60% hands-on coding time while leading team and driving architectural decisions

evidence.description: Convince engineering teams to adopt new practices, technologies, and architectural patterns
evidence.outcome: Successfully drove adoption of infrastructure-as-code across 8 teams improving deployment reliability

evidence.description: Negotiate scope, timeline, and resource tradeoffs with product management and executive stakeholders
evidence.outcome: Delivered critical features on time by negotiating scope reductions while preserving core value

evidence.description: Catch subtle edge cases and error conditions during code review preventing production incidents
evidence.outcome: Prevented 20+ potential production issues through meticulous code review over 2 years

evidence.description: Consistently deliver committed work on schedule while maintaining quality standards
evidence.outcome: 100% sprint commitment completion rate over 3 years building reputation as reliable execution partner

evidence.description: Debugged complex distributed systems issues requiring weeks of investigation and hypothesis testing
evidence.outcome: Resolved 5 multi-week debugging investigations that other engineers had abandoned as unsolvable

evidence.description: Proactively identified and addressed technical debt before it caused production issues
evidence.outcome: Prevented 3 potential outages through early detection and remediation of scaling bottlenecks

evidence.description: Break down complex technical problems into analyzable components and root causes
evidence.outcome: Consistently identify optimal solutions faster than peers through systematic problem decomposition

evidence.description: Remain calm and effective during high-pressure production incidents affecting thousands of users
evidence.outcome: Led 15+ P0 incident responses maintaining clear thinking and systematic debugging under pressure

evidence.description: Quickly pivot when technical approaches prove infeasible or requirements change mid-project
evidence.outcome: Salvaged 3 projects at risk of failure through rapid adaptation when initial approaches hit roadblocks

evidence.description: Apply general system design principles to specific architectural decisions and implementation choices
evidence.outcome: Consistently make sound technical decisions avoiding common pitfalls and anti-patterns

evidence.description: Identify patterns across multiple incidents to determine systemic root causes vs one-off issues
evidence.outcome: Discovered and fixed 5 systemic reliability issues preventing recurring incident patterns

evidence.description: Calculate system capacity, scaling requirements, and resource utilization for architecture planning
evidence.outcome: Accurately predicted infrastructure needs enabling cost-effective scaling without over-provisioning

evidence.description: Designed novel caching strategy for complex multi-tenant query patterns with shared data
evidence.outcome: Achieved 90% cache hit rate reducing database load 10x and cutting infrastructure costs $150K annually

purpose: Build systems and teams that deliver reliable, scalable solutions to hard problems.
